text: nan khux swn hnung cak brrda khaw khxng sing renlab sung rea chicæng hı cea thrab læa cea midi xyu n thi phwk khea khna thi phwk khea yo kheruxng seiyngthay khxng phwk khea(pheux thrab wa) khır nı hmu phwk khea ca di xup ka ra maryam læa cea midi xyu n thi phwk khea khna phwk khea totheiyng kan
